backend/main.mo: Main backend actor that includes blob storage mixin and manages published PDFs with publish, retrieve, list, and search functionality using case-insensitive text matching.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting four PDF translator features including implementation, disclaimer display, navigation integration, and page component creation with high confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend files describing routing, layout, tool pages (converters, splitter, merger, editor, translator), reusable components, and styling configuration.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS styles defining OKLCH color system variables for light and dark themes with neutral grayscale palette and red accent colors for destructive actions.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with root div and module script reference to main.tsx for the React application titled 'Create your own PDF'.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component configuring TanStack Router with routes for home, PDF tools (convert, split, merge, unlock, edit), and the new PDF translator feature.
frontend/src/components/EditorToolbar.ts: Toolbar component for PDF editor providing tool selection buttons (select, text, highlight, shapes, signature) with active state styling.
frontend/src/components/FileUploader.tsx: Reusable file upload component with drag-and-drop support, file type and size validation, simulated progress tracking, and error handling.
frontend/src/components/ImageReorder.tsx: Component displaying uploaded images in a grid with thumbnails, sequential numbering, remove buttons, and order indication for PDF generation.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Main layout component with sticky header, logo, navigation menu (desktop and mobile), and footer. Renders child routes via Outlet and includes links to all PDF tool pages.
frontend/src/components/PageSelector.tsx: Component for selecting individual PDF pages or page ranges with visual grid display. Provides select all, clear, and range input controls for page selection management.
frontend/src/components/PdfCanvas.tsx: Canvas component for rendering and navigating PDF pages with tool interaction. Currently simulates PDF rendering with page navigation controls.
frontend/src/components/PdfReorder.tsx: Component displaying a list of PDF files with reordering capability and remove buttons. Shows file names, sizes, and merge order.
frontend/src/components/ToolCard.tsx: Reusable card component for displaying PDF tool options with icon, title, description, and link. Features hover effects and navigation to tool pages.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook for managing backend actor instances with Internet Identity authentication. Handles actor creation, caching, and query invalidation on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication using DFINITY AuthClient. Manages login state, identity persistence, and authentication lifecycle.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for PDF operations including fetching PDF lists, searching, retrieving published PDFs, and publishing new PDFs via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes using OKLCH color space. Defines design tokens for colors, borders, and component styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClient, InternetIdentityProvider, and renders the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/DocToPdfConverter.tsx: Page component for converting DOCX, TXT, and RTF documents to PDF format with file upload, conversion simulation, and download functionality.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: Landing page displaying a hero section and grid of nine PDF tool cards (convert, edit, merge, split, translate, etc.) with descriptions and navigation links.
frontend/src/pages/ImageToPdfConverter.t: Page component for combining multiple images into a single PDF with drag-and-drop reordering, removal, and conversion functionality.
frontend/src/pages/PdfEditor.tsx: PDF editing page with toolbar for selecting annotation tools (text, highlight, shapes, signature) and canvas for applying edits to uploaded PDFs.
frontend/src/pages/PdfMerge.tsx: Page component for merging multiple PDF files with upload, reordering, removal, and merge functionality to create a single combined document.
frontend/src/pages/PdfSplitter.tsx: Page component for splitting PDFs by selecting specific pages or ranges, with upload, page selection, and extraction functionality.
frontend/src/pages/PdfToDocConverter.tsx: React component for converting PDF files to editable document formats (TXT or DOCX) with file upload, format selection, and download functionality using placeholder conversion logic.
frontend/src/pages/PdfToImageConverter.t: React component for converting PDF pages to images with file upload, conversion trigger, and image gallery display with individual/batch download options using simulated conversion.
frontend/src/pages/PdfTranslator.tsx: React component for translating PDF documents between 12 languages with source/target language selection, progress tracking, and download functionality while preserving layout (with placeholder translation logic).
frontend/src/pages/PdfUnlock.tsx: React component for removing password protection from encrypted PDFs by accepting password input, validating it, and providing download of unlocked file using simulated unlock logic.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom OKLCH color system, extended theme including sidebar/chart colors, container settings, custom animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking a red-themed PDF manipulation platform with 9 implemented features including converters, splitter, merger, unlock, and editing tools, noting need for translation icon asset.
